name: Garbage Rooms Waterproofing
Area barricaded off to allow no access to balconies with signs posted/ visible to include date of application, "No access waterproofing work in progress"
Attach relevant photos
Membrane system & methodology checked off against Aland standard waterproofing details & MSDS
Substrate clean, structurally sound & ready to receive membrane as per application guidelines of specified waterproofing system.
Ensure no high points or crevices are in the substrate
HOLDPOINT - Do not proceed if above has not been signed off
Apply 1st coat of Duromix Hibuild WBE epoxy primer to walls and floors - Apply selected primer at a rate of 1.5m2/L as per datasheet & application guidelines
Attach relevant photos
Apply 2nd coat of Duromix Hibuild WBE epoxy primer to walls and floors - Apply selected primer at a rate of 1.5m2/L as per datasheet & application guidelines
Attach relevant photos
Apply 1st coat of Duropoxy SLR100 epoxy top coat to walls and floors - Apply selected top coat a a rate of 6.6m2/L as per datasheet & application guidelines
Attach relevant photos
Apply 2nd coat of Duropoxy SLR100 epoxy top coat to walls and floors - Apply selected top coat a a rate of 6.6m2/L as per datasheet & application guidelines
Attach relevant photos
Carry out dry film thickness test using positector coating thickness inspection instruction. - Review result against datatsheet & application guidelines
Attach relevant photos
If required - Rectification of defective works for failure of flood test/thickness test & all works completed.
Attach relevant photos
Final sign off - All general waterproofing work completed as per the above ITP
HOLDPOINT - Once all above items have been signed off work may proceed
